ffiinniisshhiinngg iinnssttrruuccttiioonnss aabboovvee ©yarntripping designs cowl pattern worsted weight chain 87 loosely with h 5 00mm crochet hook for a looser cowl increase beginning chain in increments of 12 each additional 12 chain will add approximately 4 to the circumference row 1 rs double_crochet in fourth chain from hook and in next 3 chain 3 skipped chain count as first double_crochet *pattern repeat repeat from * across ending last repeat at ** 2 double_crochet in last chain chain 3 and turn row 2 working in back loop only throughout double_crochet in first st and in next 3 sts *pattern repeat repeat from * across ending last repeat at ** 2 double_crochet in last st chain 3 and turn repeat row 2 until your skein of yarn is almost gone or you reach your
